typeSystemDescription.name: typeSystemDescriptor
typeSystemDescription.description: This typesystem describes the relevant classes necessary for the pi7-kmaki annotation and evaluation engine frameworks.

typeDescription.name: type.ComponentAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A parent annotation which expects individual annotation types to inherit from.

featureDescription.name: componentId
featureDescription.description: An identifier that specifies which system produced this annotation.

typeDescription.name: type.Question
typeDescription.description: Stores the information about a question.

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: The identifier for the question.

featureDescription.name: passages
featureDescription.description: Passages associated with this question.

featureDescription.name: analysisAnnotations
featureDescription.description: Annotations associated with this question.

typeDescription.name: type.Passage
typeDescription.description: Stores the information of the passage.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: This stores a gold standard label of this answer. 'True' means that it answers the question; otherwise, it is does not.

featureDescription.name: sourceDocId
featureDescription.description: This specifies the source document id to which the passage belongs to.

featureDescription.name: passage
featureDescription.description: The text of the passage annotated by this annotation.

featureDescription.name: question
featureDescription.description: The question for which this passage is a candidate answer.

featureDescription.name: analysisAnnotations
featureDescription.description: The annotations associated with this passage.

typeDescription.name: type.ScoredSpan
typeDescription.description: A span with a score

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: The score for this annotation

typeDescription.name: type.Span
typeDescription.description: Component Annotation with a text field to identify the relevant text of the annotated span.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: The relevant text of the annotated Span

typeDescription.name: type.TokenizedSpan
typeDescription.description: Annotation providing a tokenization for the annotated span

featureDescription.name: tokens
featureDescription.description: The tokenization for the annotated Span

typeDescription.name: type.TokenAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Annotates a test element with tokenizations for the question and each of its passages.

featureDescription.name: questionTokens
featureDescription.description: The tokenization for the annotated Test Element's question.

featureDescription.name: passageTokens
featureDescription.description: List of tokenizations for the respective passages associated with the annotated Test Element.

typeDescription.name: type.Ngram
typeDescription.description: A Span annotation holding a tokenization of fixed length n.

featureDescription.name: n
featureDescription.description: The number of tokens n in the annotated ngram.

typeDescription.name: type.NgramSet
typeDescription.description: Holds a set of ngrams annotated within the annotated span.

featureDescription.name: ngrams
featureDescription.description: Array of ngrams annotated for this Span.

typeDescription.name: type.NgramAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Annotates ngrams for the relevant parts of a test element.

featureDescription.name: questionNgrams
featureDescription.description: The set of ngrams annotated for the question associated with this Test Element.

featureDescription.name: passageNgrams
featureDescription.description: List of sets of ngrams for each of the respective passages associated with this Test Element.

typeDescription.name: type.Scoring
typeDescription.description: Annotation holding the ranking scores for each of the passages associated with this Test Element.

featureDescription.name: scores
featureDescription.description: The list of scores for each of the respective passages associated with this Test Element.

typeDescription.name: type.TestElementAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Annotation which builds on a test element.

featureDescription.name: question
featureDescription.description: The question associated with this annotation.

typeDescription.name: type.OutputAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The finished output for the annotated test element.

featureDescription.name: output
featureDescription.description: The output for the annotated test element.

typeDescription.name: type.SpanModification
typeDescription.description: An annotation which modifies a span (e.g. a tokenization).

featureDescription.name: orig
featureDescription.description: The original span annotation for this downstream annotation.

typeDescription.name: type.PAtN
typeDescription.description: Annotation indicating precision at a certain rank for the given test element.

featureDescription.name: n
featureDescription.description: The rank at which the precision at n was computed.

typeDescription.name: type.Metric
typeDescription.description: Annotation indicating the performance of the system on some test element under a certain metric.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The value of the system evaluated on the current test element under the metric.

featureDescription.name: metricName
featureDescription.description: String naming the metric used to evaluate the system on the test element.

typeDescription.name: type.ConfMatrix
typeDescription.description: The information about the confusion matrix for the given test element.

featureDescription.name: tp
featureDescription.description: True positives score for the given test element.

featureDescription.name: tn
featureDescription.description: True negatives score for the given test element.

featureDescription.name: fp
featureDescription.description: False positives score for the given Test Element.

featureDescription.name: fn
featureDescription.description: False negatives score for the given test element.

typeDescription.name: type.ReportAnnotation
typeDescription.description: An annotation which summarizes the system's performance with respect to a test element.

featureDescription.name: testElement
featureDescription.description: The test element referred to by this report.

featureDescription.name: metrics
featureDescription.description: The metrics associated with the given report.

typeDescription.name: type.PerformanceAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Report Annotation summarizing the performance of the system on a single test element.

typeDescription.name: type.ErrorAnalysisAnnotation
typeDescription.description: ReportAnnotation summarizing the system's performance on a test element with respect to error analysis.

typeDescription.name: type.Score
typeDescription.description: A double value that remembers the name of the component which annotated it.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: The value annotated by this annotation.
